> Regardless yes it can be sorted.  I don't think the game cares much 
about
> where objects are in the list, or if there can be speed gains from 
sorting
> them a specific way (Tom?) so it should be ok.

The game does care.  It dishes your team out on the grid according to 
the order in which the player positions are listed in the file.  With 
teleporters, it goes to the 1st teleporter laid down, 2nd teleporter 
laid down, etc for a given teleporter number until it gets to the last 
one.

Having the scenario converter around is almost as good as having a 
full-blown scenario text editor.
